div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 390px; margin-left: 411px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

font.font: Enables public verifiable streams of transactions, e.g. Granular Certificates.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 600px; margin-left: 411px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

font.font: Conventional blockchain that will store a series of hashes for each merkle tree, ensuring that data within the tree cannot be changed without it being visible.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 390px; margin-left: 851px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

font.font: Other registries that supports the same protocol, enabled cross registry claims.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 150px; margin-left: 181px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

font.font: Holds owners certificates, information and keys, and coordinates cross-regsitry transactions and claims.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 133px; margin-left: 770px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

font.font:
A user that wants to validate
claims aganst the registry

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 390px; margin-left: 11px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

font.font: Will replace hard-coded rules to a ruleset defined by a shared ownership of the participating registries.

div.b:
Can read public data
to verify the authenticity of data.
